title: Free From The Law
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Free from the law— oh, happy condition!
Jesus has bled, and there is remission;
Cursed by the law and bruised by the fall,
Christ has redeemed us once for all.
v2: There on the cross your burden up-bearing,
Thorns on His brow your Savior is wearing;
Never again your sin need appall,
You have been pardoned once for all.
v3: Now we are free— there's no condemnation;
"Come unto Me," oh, hear His sweet call,
Come, and He saves us once for all.
v4: Surely His grace will keep us from falling;
Passing from death to life at His call,
c1: Once for all— oh, sinner, receive it;
Once for all— oh, brother, believe it;
Cling to the cross, the burden will fall,
Christ has redeemed us once for all.
